ygData.subject: Grobb Cleaver Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The Troll in OOT is 19 or 20th level, but surprisingly weak for that level of MOB.  You have to do the locker part of the quest as the locker contains the
ygData.messageBody:
The Troll in OOT is 19 or 20th level, but surprisingly weak for that level of MOB. You have to do the locker part of the quest as the locker contains the recipe. The locker will actually raise faction. I think the same faction that will suffer when you kill him, so killing him should be a wash faction wise. And yes, I was able to give Carver C. the stuff despite him conning dubious to me. There is no way that I know of that will raise faction with either the Ogres or Trolls when you can't do their quests.

Scragg Wraithbone of Bristlebane (22nd level TSK)

Original-From: rich.hitz@...
Original-Reply-to: shadowknight@onelist.com
Original-Date: Fri, 27 Aug 1999 16:26:28 +0000

From: rich.hitz@...

I saw a post this morning that said the Troll in OOT is
between 20-24th level MOB. It also siad that getting the
Recipe from the Troll (by killing it) lowered faction
with DaBashers and Shadow Knights of Grobb. /con Carver
before you kill Nerbilik and see what you con to him.
Try to get your faction up to about Amiable if not
already (ie indifferant). This way the faction hits will
not prevent you from getting the Cleaver. The poster
said he gave the Cleaver with a /con of dubious.
What raises Faction with Grobb SKs and DaBashers?
I don't know if you need to do the locker part of the
quest or not. Anyone?

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
10th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
